Description.Text: Located in the famed Murray Hill area of Manhattan, St Giles Hotel – The Tuscany is a gem among New York's midtown hotels, offering a sanctuary within the city of dreams. Within walking distance from Grand Central Station and the iconic Chrysler Building, you are only a few blocks away to visit Times Square, Empire State Building, catch a show on Broadway or even Madison Square Gardens.

• Chrysler Building - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • The Morgan Library and Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • New York Public Library - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Empire State Building - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Bryant Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Macy's - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • St. Patrick's Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi • Times Square - 1 km / 0.6 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 1 km / 0.6 mi • Broadway - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi • Central Park - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi • Ellis Island - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi • Statue of Liberty - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi

Guestrooms and suites are extra-spacious, especially by New York standards. All have 27-inch flat-screen TVs with premium cable channels, pay movies, and DVD/CD players. Wireless and wired high-speed Internet access are available for a surcharge. Beds offer pillowtop mattresses, luxury linens, and down pillows. Other amenities include minibars, large desks, in-room safes, and cordless speakerphones. Bathrooms include bathrobes, hair dryers, and Archive Essentials Collection toiletries. Turndown service, compact refrigerators, and microwaves are available upon request.

Part of a London-based hotel group, St Giles Hotel – The Tuscany is in Midtown Manhattan’s Murray Hill neighborhood, between Lexington and Park avenues. Grand Central Station, the Chrysler Building, the Empire State Building, Macy’s, the New York Public Library, and Bryant Park are among the many attractions within a half-mile. The hotel offers 24-hour in-room dining. A café serves breakfast (surcharge), and a lounge is open evenings. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available in public areas and guestrooms/suites.
Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Audrey cafe lounge is located at the hotel and offers a light continental style breakfast each morning.
To ensure each guest a stay that is both comfortable and productive; the beautifully appointed W - The Tuscany Hotel is filled with every amenity
